thread.title: U.S. Oil Rig Count Falls to 662 in Latest Week
thread.title_full: U.S. Oil Rig Count Falls to 662 in Latest Week - WSJ

author: Angela Chen
title: U.S. Oil Rig Count Falls to 662 in Latest Week
text:
The U.S. oil-rig count fell by 13 to 662 in the latest week, breaking six consecutive weeks of increases, according to Baker Hughes Inc.
The number of U.S. oil-drilling rigs, which is a proxy for activity in the oil industry, has fallen sharply since oil... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
